content.raw:
Fixed Windows tests in https://bitbucket.org/traversaro/ign-math/commits/93d6151a55aac374bce2406eade99563120ed6f4?at=default . 

Furthermore I generated the -targets.cmake also for the build directory. 

This is convenient on Windows because  if you run cmake from Gui , the build directory will be 
"cached" and subsequent calls in different projects to find_package(ignition-math2 ) will 
find the library in the build directory over the installed one (unless you explicitly set ignition-math2_DIR). 
(See step 5 in https://cmake.org/cmake/help/v3.0/command/find_package.html ).

Fixed Windows tests in https://bitbucket.org/traversaro/ign-math/commits/93d6151a55aac374bce2406eade99563120ed6f4?at=default .

Furthermore I generated the -targets.cmake also for the build directory.

This is convenient on Windows because if you run cmake from Gui , the build directory will be "cached" and subsequent calls in different projects to find_package(ignition-math2 ) will find the library in the build directory over the installed one (unless you explicitly set ignition-math2_DIR). (See step 5 in https://cmake.org/cmake/help/v3.0/command/find_package.html ).
